TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed WindowManagerTypes extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Enumerates values returned by several types and taken as a parameter of several types.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Views.WindowManagerTypes Application = int32(2)

summary.para: Window type: a normal application window. The must be an Activity token identifying who the window belongs to. In multiuser systems shows only on the owning user's window.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Views.WindowManagerTypes ApplicationAttachedDialog = int32(1003)

summary.para: Window type: like , but layout of the window happens as that of a top-level window, not as a child of its container.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Views.WindowManagerTypes ApplicationMedia = int32(1001)

summary.para: Window type: window for showing media (such as video). These windows are displayed behind their attached window.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Views.WindowManagerTypes ApplicationPanel = int32(1000)

summary.para: Window type: a panel on top of an application window. These windows appear on top of their attached window.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Views.WindowManagerTypes ApplicationStarting = int32(3)

summary.para: Window type: special application window that is displayed while the application is starting. Not for use by applications themselves; this is used by the system to display something until the application can show its own windows. In multiuser systems shows on all users' windows.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Views.WindowManagerTypes ApplicationSubPanel = int32(1002)

summary.para: Window type: a sub-panel on top of an application window. These windows are displayed on top their attached window and any panels.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Views.WindowManagerTypes BaseApplication = int32(1)

summary.para: Window type: an application window that serves as the "base" window of the overall application; all other application windows will appear on top of it. In multiuser systems shows only on the owning user's window.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Views.WindowManagerTypes InputMethod = int32(2011)

summary.para: Window type: internal input methods windows, which appear above the normal UI. Application windows may be resized or panned to keep the input focus visible while this window is displayed. In multiuser systems shows only on the owning user's window.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Views.WindowManagerTypes InputMethodDialog = int32(2012)

summary.para: Window type: internal input methods dialog windows, which appear above the current input method window. In multiuser systems shows only on the owning user's window.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Views.WindowManagerTypes Keyguard = int32(2004)

summary.para: Window type: keyguard window. In multiuser systems shows on all users' windows.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Views.WindowManagerTypes KeyguardDialog = int32(2009)

summary.para: Window type: dialogs that the keyguard shows In multiuser systems shows on all users' windows.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Views.WindowManagerTypes Phone = int32(2002)

summary.para: Window type: phone. These are non-application windows providing user interaction with the phone (in particular incoming calls). These windows are normally placed above all applications, but behind the status bar. In multiuser systems shows on all users' windows.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Views.WindowManagerTypes PriorityPhone = int32(2007)

summary.para: Window type: priority phone UI, which needs to be displayed even if the keyguard is active. These windows must not take input focus, or they will interfere with the keyguard. In multiuser systems shows on all users' windows.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Views.WindowManagerTypes PrivatePresentation = int32(2030)
.field public static literal valuetype Android.Views.WindowManagerTypes SearchBar = int32(2001)

summary.para: Window type: the search bar. There can be only one search bar window; it is placed at the top of the screen. In multiuser systems shows on all users' windows.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Views.WindowManagerTypes StatusBar = int32(2000)

summary.para: Window type: the status bar. There can be only one status bar window; it is placed at the top of the screen, and all other windows are shifted down so they are below it. In multiuser systems shows on all users' windows.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Views.WindowManagerTypes StatusBarPanel = int32(2014)

summary.para: Window type: panel that slides out from over the status bar In multiuser systems shows on all users' windows.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Views.WindowManagerTypes SystemAlert = int32(2003)

summary.para: Window type: system window, such as low power alert. These windows are always on top of application windows. In multiuser systems shows only on the owning user's window.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Views.WindowManagerTypes SystemDialog = int32(2008)

summary.para: Window type: panel that slides out from the status bar In multiuser systems shows on all users' windows.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Views.WindowManagerTypes SystemError = int32(2010)

summary.para: Window type: internal system error windows, appear on top of everything they can. In multiuser systems shows only on the owning user's window.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Views.WindowManagerTypes SystemOverlay = int32(2006)

summary.para: Window type: system overlay windows, which need to be displayed on top of everything else. These windows must not take input focus, or they will interfere with the keyguard. In multiuser systems shows only on the owning user's window.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Views.WindowManagerTypes Toast = int32(2005)

summary.para: Window type: transient notifications. In multiuser systems shows only on the owning user's window.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Views.WindowManagerTypes Wallpaper = int32(2013)

summary.para: Window type: wallpaper window, placed behind any window that wants to sit on top of the wallpaper. In multiuser systems shows only on the owning user's window.
